thread.title: Two Local Teams In New Prep Poll
thread.title_full: Two Local Teams In New Prep Poll

author: Colin Bowles
title: Two Local Teams In New Prep Poll
text:
Two Local Teams In New Prep Poll - WVVA TV Bluefield Beckley WV News, Weather and Sports Member Center: Two Local Teams In New Prep Poll Posted: Follow @ColinxBowles 
(WVVA) 
Bluefield and James Monroe both come in ranked for this weeks Class AA list of the Charleston Gazette-Mail prep football poll, as voted by statewide sportswriters. The Beavers and Mavericks will meet each other in a week 10 matchup, at Mitchell Stadium, on Friday. 
Official ratings, used to select the postseason playoff field, will be released on Tuesday by the West Virginia Secondary School Activities Commission. 
CLASS AAA 
Others receiving votes: Brooke, Greenbrier East . 
CLASS AA 
Others receiving votes: Herbert Hoover, Weir, Summers County . 
CLASS A Two Local Teams In New Prep Poll Bluefield and James Monroe both come in ranked for this weeks Class AA list of the Charleston Gazette-Mail prep football poll.
